summary: GAO's work yielded $67.5 billion in financial benefits for the federal government in FY 2024—a return of $76 for every dollar invested in us. We did it by recommending ways to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of federal programs and more. For example, we: Prompted the Department of Defense to improve its efforts to identify improper payments—i.e., payment errors and fraud—resulting in $4.8 billion in...
title: Performance and Accountability Report, Fiscal Year 2024
